steps.question: Were you and the deceased married?
Was there a pending divorce case at the time of the deceased’s death?

steps.outcome: No inheritance right.
The inheritance right of the spouse will be affected by the will. However, the spouse has a right to at least 4 price base amounts.
steps.legal_sources: 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § ÄB, 3 kap. 1 § ÄB

steps.question: Does the deceased have any surviving descendants?
Have they waived their inheritance rights in favour of the surviving spouse?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal rights, as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
The spouse inherits with free disposal rights, as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
The spouse will inherit, apart from the inheritance share which the children from another relationship will receive immediately.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § ÄB, 3 kap. 9 § ÄB é contrario, 3 kap. 2 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with full ownership.

steps.question: Have the children from another relationship waived their inheritance rights?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal rights, and the children inherit their statutory share.

steps.question: Were you and the deceased cohabiting but not married?
Is there a valid will where the testator mentioned the cohabitant?

steps.outcome: No inheritance right.
The cohabitant inherits according to the will unless contested by any surviving children or heirs.
The cohabitant has no inheritance rights but is entitled to 2 price base amounts for security.

steps.question: Does the deceased have any surviving parents or siblings?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal rights.
The spouse inherits with full ownership.

steps.question: Have any children contested the will?

steps.outcome: The children receive their statutory share as a subsequent inheritance, meaning the spouse inherits the rest according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § ÄB

steps.outcome: As you were not married to the deceased nor mentioned as a beneficiary in a will, you have no inheritance right. However, you are entitled to 2 price base amounts for security.
steps.legal_sources: SamboL 18 § 2 st, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 3 kap. 1 § e contrario

steps.question: Is there a will in which the testator has mentioned you as a beneficiary?
Were you still in a relationship when the deceased died?
Does the testator have any surviving children?

steps.outcome: The will is not valid anymore. Hence, you have no inheritance right.

steps.question: Have any of the children contested the will?

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits any assets designated to them as stipulated in the will.
The children receive their statutory share, and the cohabitant inherits any remaining assets as stipulated in the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits according to the will apart from the statutory share of the inheritance, which the children have a right to receive.
